name: Paperboo
description: Always nostalgic over when it hatched from its shell.

1.name: Decoy Paper Armor
1.description:
Active Skill
Uses a cardboard box to camouflage itself, inducing a taunt effect: While camouflaged, being attacked by enemies or reaching the camouflage time limit will trigger an explosion, dealing Physical DMG in an area.

1.name: Cardboard Armor
1.description:
Additional Ability
When there is at least 1 Defense character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack generates Shield for all squad members. The more enemies hit, the more Shield generated, up to a max of 15% of Paperboo's Max HP.

2.name: Cardboard Armor
2.description:
Additional Ability
When there is at least 1 Defense character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack generates Shield for all squad members. The more enemies hit, the more Shield generated, up to a max of 16.5% of Paperboo's Max HP.

3.name: Cardboard Armor
3.description:
Additional Ability
When there is at least 1 Defense character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack generates Shield for all squad members. The more enemies hit, the more Shield generated, up to a max of 18% of Paperboo's Max HP.

4.name: Cardboard Armor

5.name: Cardboard Armor
5.description:
Additional Ability
When there is at least 1 Defense character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack generates Shield for all squad members. The more enemies hit, the more Shield generated, up to a max of 21% of Paperboo's Max HP.

1.name: Paper Armor: Impact Mode
1.description:
Bangboo Chain Attack
Enters a cardboard box and jumps at the target enemy, causing an explosion when it lands, dealing Physical DMG over a large area.
